name: Chupacabra
description: A swift, reptilian predator that drains the life force of its victims. The goat-sucker of legend is all too real.

abilities.name: Blood Drain
abilities.description: Attacks restore 25% of damage dealt as health.

abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.description: Leaps at a target, dealing bonus damage and briefly stunning.

abilities.name: Taste Blood
abilities.description: Gains attack speed when attacking injured targets.

abilities.name: Evasion
abilities.description: Has a chance to dodge incoming attacks.
